other_title: A Bridge to the Starry Skies
plot: Directly following the TV series, this OVA follows Kazuma's friend Daigo and his interactions with the girls as the school festival approaches.
opening_theme: "Hoshikaze no Horoscope" (星風ホのロスコープ) by Nomico
ending_theme: "Dash do Cinderella" (だっしゅどシンデレラ) by Eriko Nakamura and Ai Shimizu
insert_song: "Mighty Girl Power de ☆" (Mighty Girl パワーde ☆) by Aiko Ōkubo
